tool_description: Creates and configures various rating scales for survey questions including Likert scales, numeric ranges, and custom rating systems.

scale_name.description: Name identifier for the rating scale

scale_type.description: Type of scale: likert_5, likert_7, numeric, custom, frequency, agreement, satisfaction

custom_labels.description: Custom labels for scale points (required for custom scale_type)

error_messages: Invalid scale type: Must be one of [likert_5, likert_7, numeric, custom, frequency, agreement, satisfaction]
Invalid range: scale_range_min must be less than scale_range_max, both within 1-10
Missing custom labels: custom_labels array required when scale_type is 'custom'
Invalid label count: custom_labels must contain 2-10 items
Empty scale name: scale_name cannot be empty or contain only whitespace
usage: Provide scale_name and scale_type. For numeric scales, optionally set scale_range_min and scale_range_max. For custom scales, provide custom_labels array. Set include_neutral to control neutral option availability.

scale_id.description: Unique identifier for the created scale

scale_definition.description: Complete scale configuration as JSON string

scale_range.description: Description of the scale range and type
